trans-unit.source: Represents the result returned by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule" />.<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate(System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" />
trans-unit.target: Representa o resultado retornado pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule" />.<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate(System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" />

trans-unit.source: method that indicates whether the checked value passed the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule" />.
trans-unit.target: método que indica se o valor verificado passou uma <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule" />.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model enables you to associate <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A> with your <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> object.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] modelo de associação de dados permite que você associe <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A> com seus <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> ou <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> objeto.

trans-unit.source: You can create custom rules by subclassing the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> class and implementing the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você pode criar regras personalizadas por subclassificação o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> classe e implementando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult> object to report whether the checked value is valid.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> método retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult> objeto para relatar se o valor marcado é válido.

trans-unit.source: For a detailed discussion of the validation process, see "Data Validation" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma discussão detalhada sobre o processo de validação, consulte "Validação de dados" em [visão geral de associação de dados](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the implementation of a validation rule that marks the input value as invalid if it contains non-numeric characters or outside the lower and upper bounds.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra a implementação de uma regra de validação que marca o valor de entrada como inválido se ele contém caracteres não numéricos ou fora os limites inferior e superior.

trans-unit.source: If the value is invalid, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult.ErrorContent%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult.IsValid%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult> are set to the appropriate error message and `false` respectively.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for inválido, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult.ErrorContent%2A> propriedade e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult.IsValid%2A> propriedade retornado <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult> são definidos para a mensagem de erro apropriada e `false` respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see [How to: Implement Binding Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md).
trans-unit.target: Para o exemplo completo, consulte [como: implementar a validação de associação](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md).

trans-unit.source: Whether or not the value checked against the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule" /> is valid.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor verificado em relação a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule" /> é válido ou não.

trans-unit.source: Information about the invalidity.
trans-unit.target: Informações sobre a invalidade.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult" />.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model enables you to associate <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A> with your <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> object.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] modelo de associação de dados permite que você associe <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A> com seus <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> ou <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> objeto.

trans-unit.source: You can create custom rules by subclassing the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> class and implementing the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você pode criar regras personalizadas por subclassificação o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> classe e implementando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult> object to report whether the checked value is valid.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> método retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult> objeto para relatar se o valor marcado é válido.

trans-unit.source: For a detailed discussion of the validation process, see "Data Validation" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma discussão detalhada sobre o processo de validação, consulte "Validação de dados" em [visão geral de associação de dados](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the implementation of a validation rule that marks the input value as invalid if it contains non-numeric characters or outside the lower and upper bounds.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra a implementação de uma regra de validação que marca o valor de entrada como inválido se ele contém caracteres não numéricos ou fora os limites inferior e superior.

trans-unit.source: If the value is invalid, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult.ErrorContent%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult.IsValid%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult> are set to the appropriate error message and `false` respectively.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for inválido, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult.ErrorContent%2A> propriedade e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult.IsValid%2A> propriedade retornado <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult> são definidos para a mensagem de erro apropriada e `false` respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see [How to: Implement Binding Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md).
trans-unit.target: Para o exemplo completo, consulte [como: implementar a validação de associação](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult" /> instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: A instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Compares the specified instance and the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult" /> for value equality.
trans-unit.target: Compara a instância especificada e a instância atual de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult" /> quanto à igualdade de valores.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> and this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult" />.have the same values.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="obj" /> e essa instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult" /> tiverem os mesmos valores.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the operator overrides.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelas substituições de operador.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that provides additional information about the invalidity.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que fornece informações adicionais sobre a invalidade.

trans-unit.source: An object that provides additional information about the invalidity.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que fornece informações adicionais sobre a invalidade.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model enables you to associate <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A> with your <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> object.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult" />.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult" />.
trans-unit.target: O código hash deste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the value checked against the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule" /> is valid.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o valor selecionado em relação a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule" /> é válido.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value is valid; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o valor for válido; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model enables you to associate <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A> with your <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> object.

trans-unit.source: The first instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira instância a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: The second instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda instância a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult" /> objects for value equality.
trans-unit.target: Compara dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult" /> quanto à igualdade de valor.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os dois objetos forem iguais; do contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The first instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira instância a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: The second instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda instância a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult" /> objects for value inequality.
trans-unit.target: Compara dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult" /> quanto à desigualdade de valor.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the values are not equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os valores não forem iguais, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a valid instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma instância válida de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult" />.

trans-unit.source: A valid instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância válida de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult" />.
